name: Classes and Interfaces must have JavaDoc @author tag
description: When enforcing the utilization of JavaDoc Comments to document an application, the @author tag should be used to know who wrote a given Class or Interface.
output:
This report lists all Classes and Interfaces not having the @author JavaDoc comments.
This report provides the following information:
 Class or Interface Full Name
rationale: When enforcing the utilization of JavaDoc Comments to document an application, the @author tag should be used to know who wrote a given Class or Interface.
total: Number of classes and interfaces (generic or not)
alternativeName: Ensure you have JavaDoc @author tag for Classes and Interfaces
